Get the WRITTEN RECIPE here - https://www.veganricha.com/breaded-tofu-strips/

SUBSCRIBE HERE: https://www.youtube.com/veganricharecipes?sub_confirmation=1

Spicy Crispy Breaded Tofu Strips. Marinated Tofu breaded and grilled or baked. Flavorful and easy. Vegan Breaded Tofu, Holiday Recipe. Can be made gluten-free with glutenfree bread crumbs. Easily doubled.

This easy crisped up tofu needs just a few minutes of active time. Brush the marinade on the Tofu strips and let it sit for a while, then bread and grill. Serve as side or main with a side of salad or pilaf.  The ketchup, spices, soy sauce make a great marinade, which also acts like a sticky coat to keep all those breadcrumbs on. Use other sauces like bbq, and spices and herbs of choice.

recipeIngredient: 14 oz extra firm or firm tofu pressed ((I usually use Nasoya Organic non gmo))
1 tsp maple syrup or other sweetener
1/2 tsp garam masala (or 1/2 tsp ground cumin and 1/2 tsp ground coriander)
1/2  tsp cornstarch or tapioca starch ((optional, helps the breadcrumbs stick better during grilling))
3/4 cup breadcrumbs (, use gluten-free crumbs to make gf)

recipeInstructions.text: Slice the slab into 6 to 8 rectangles. Press the tofu for half an hour between kitchen towels and under a heavy weight to remove excess moisture. or use Tofu press (before or after slicing).
recipeInstructions.name: Slice the slab into 6 to 8 rectangles. Press the tofu for half an hour between kitchen towels and under a heavy weight to remove excess moisture. or use Tofu press (before or after slicing).

recipeInstructions.text: Mix the marinade ingredients. (Add 1/2 tsp cornstarch to the marinade for extra binding). Dip the tofu in the marinade and coat all sides to make an even coating that is not too thick or too thin. Place the tofu strips in a container with a lid.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix the marinade ingredients. (Add 1/2 tsp cornstarch to the marinade for extra binding). Dip the tofu in the marinade and coat all sides to make an even coating that is not too thick or too thin. Place the tofu strips in a container with a lid.

recipeInstructions.text: Refrigerate for atleast half an hour or longer.
recipeInstructions.name: Refrigerate for atleast half an hour or longer.

recipeInstructions.text: Mix everything under breadcrumb coating. If the breadcrumbs are too large, pulse them a few times in a blender and use.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix everything under breadcrumb coating. If the breadcrumbs are too large, pulse them a few times in a blender and use.

recipeInstructions.text: Place each tofu strip in the breadcrumb mixture. Flip to coat all sides
recipeInstructions.name: Place each tofu strip in the breadcrumb mixture. Flip to coat all sides

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a grill pan over medium high heat on the stove. Brush oil on the pan and place the breaded tofu on the pan. Cook 7 to 9 minutes each side or until brown strips appear.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat a grill pan over medium high heat on the stove. Brush oil on the pan and place the breaded tofu on the pan. Cook 7 to 9 minutes each side or until brown strips appear.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve with sauces of choice like vegan ranch or a dash of lemon, or slice and to salads, bowls, wraps, sandwiches, etc. Pictured with Butternut Squash Pilaf.
